mapper.select: SELECT dnis as dnis, stime as stime, etime as etime, va_yn as va_yn, ment as ment, crt_dt as crt_dt, crt_by as crt_by, upt_dt as upt_dt, upt_by as upt_by FROM givr.ax_ivr_emerment_gr WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO givr.ax_ivr_blackconsumer (ani, flag, crt_dt, crt_by) VALUES (#{ani}, #{flag}, #{crt_dt}, #{crt_by})
